trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma célula deve ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event to customize the appearance of cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode manipular esse evento para personalizar a aparência de células no controle.

trans-unit.source: You can paint entire cells yourself, or paint specific parts of cells and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to paint other parts.
trans-unit.target: Você pode pintar células inteiras por conta própria ou partes específicas de pintura de células e usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>métodos para pintar a outras partes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.PaintBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> class to paint standard controls using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>classe para pintar controles padrão usando o tema atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [renderização de controles com estilos visuais](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver usando [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], você também tem acesso a uma biblioteca grande de imagens padrão que você pode usar com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When handling this event, you should access the cell through the parameters of the event handler, rather than access the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: Ao lidar com esse evento, você deve acessar a célula por meio dos parâmetros do manipulador de eventos, em vez de acesso direto a célula.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell leaves edit mode if the cell value has been modified.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma célula sai do modo de edição se o valor de célula foi modificado.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will attempt to convert a user-specified value displayed in a cell to an actual underlying cell value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle tentará converter o valor especificado pelo usuário exibido em uma célula para um valor de célula subjacente real no tipo especificado pela célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This conversion uses the formatting properties of the cell style returned by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Essa conversão usa as propriedades de formatação do estilo de célula retornada pela célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the standard conversion does not meet your needs, handle the CellParsing event to provide custom value conversion to the required type.
trans-unit.target: Se a conversão padrão não atender às suas necessidades, manipule o evento de CellParsing para fornecer conversão de valor personalizado para o tipo exigido.

trans-unit.source: Users can enter edit mode using the method specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A> property, and can leave edit mode, committing any changes to a cell, by moving to another cell or by pressing ENTER.
trans-unit.target: Os usuários podem inserir o modo de edição, usando o método especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>propriedade, e pode sair do modo de edição, confirmar as alterações a uma célula, movendo-o para outra célula ou pressionando ENTER.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pressing ESC will revert any changes to the value before it is committed, and the CellParsing event will not occur.
trans-unit.target: Pressionar ESC reverterá as alterações para o valor antes de ele é confirmado, e o evento CellParsing não ocorrerá.

trans-unit.source: The CellParsing event occurs only if the cell value has actually been modified, even if the final value is the same as the original value.
trans-unit.target: O evento CellParsing ocorre somente se o valor da célula, na verdade, tiver sido modificado, mesmo se o valor final é o mesmo que o valor original.

trans-unit.source: It also occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Isso também ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellParsing event, you can convert the value yourself or you can customize the default conversion.
trans-unit.target: Ao manipular o evento CellParsing, você pode converter o valor, ou você pode personalizar a conversão padrão.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can convert the value yourself using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with type converters of your choosing.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode converter o valor por conta própria usando a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>método com conversores de tipo de sua escolha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can let the default type converters parse the value, but modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você pode permitir que o tipo de padrão conversores de analisar o valor, mas modificar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>Propriedades do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, que é inicializada usando a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you convert the value yourself, replace the initial, formatted value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property with the converted value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando você converte o valor por conta própria, substitua o valor inicial, formatado do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade com o valor convertido no tipo especificado pela célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further parsing is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para indicar que nenhuma outra análise é necessário, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is parsed using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with default type converters.
trans-unit.target: Quando o manipulador de eventos é concluída, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é `null` ou não é do tipo correto, ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é de propriedade `false`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>é analisado usando a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>método com conversores de tipo padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method parses the value using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style passed in.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão desse método analisa o valor usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>e as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>Propriedades do estilo de célula passado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is not equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, the value is parsed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property and the type converters passed in.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor não é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, o valor é analisado usando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>propriedade e os conversores de tipo passados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a cell value into a formatted value for display, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar a conversão de um valor de célula em um valor formatado para exibição, manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell state changes, such as when the cell loses or gains focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma célula é alterado estado, como quando a célula perde ou ganha o foco.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style*> property of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style*>propriedade de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> alterações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a new value or when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando qualquer propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>retornado por um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é definida para um novo valor ou quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>está definida como um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>pelo menos um valor de propriedade diferente do objeto de estilo de célula anterior.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the values of a cell style changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um dos valores de um estilo de célula é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The CellStyleContentChanged event occurs when a property value of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by one of the following properties changes: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> If one of these properties is set to a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>, however, the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event occurs, but the CellStyleContentChanged event does not occur.
trans-unit.target: O evento CellStyleContentChanged ocorre quando um valor de propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>objeto retornado por uma das seguintes alterações de propriedades:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>se uma dessas propriedades é definida como outro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>, no entanto, correspondente *PropertyName* `Changed` evento ocorre, mas não ocorrer o evento CellStyleContentChanged.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For row, column, and cell properties, the name of the *PropertyName*`Changed` event begins with "`Row`", "`Column`", or "`Cell`" (for example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>).
trans-unit.target: Para a linha, coluna e propriedades de célula, o nome do *PropertyName* `Changed` evento começa com "`Row`","`Column`", ou "`Cell`" (por exemplo, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDefaultCellStyleChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText*> property value changes for a cell in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText*>alterações de valor de propriedade para uma célula de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell's ToolTip text is needed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o texto de dica de ferramenta da célula é necessário.

trans-unit.source: The CellToolTipTextNeeded event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O evento CellToolTipTextNeeded ocorre somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>está definida ou seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>é de propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the CellToolTipTextNeeded event, the ToolTip text you specify in the handler is shown whenever the mouse pointer is over a cell and the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Ao manipular o evento CellToolTipTextNeeded, o texto de dica de ferramenta que você especificar no manipulador de é exibido sempre que o ponteiro do mouse está sobre uma célula e o controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A>é o valor da propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CellToolTipTextNeeded event is useful when you want to display ToolTips determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: O evento CellToolTipTextNeeded é útil quando você deseja exibir dicas de ferramenta determinadas pelo estado atual ou valor de uma célula.

trans-unit.source: The CellToolTipTextNeeded event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the mouse pointer enters a cell.
trans-unit.target: O evento CellToolTipTextNeeded também ocorre sempre que o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é recuperada, ou programaticamente ou quando o ponteiro do mouse entra em uma célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>Propriedades para determinar o estado ou o valor de uma célula e usar essas informações para alterar ou modificar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é inicializada com o valor da célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>propriedade, que substitui o valor do evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the CellToolTipTextNeeded event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: Manipular o evento CellToolTipTextNeeded ao trabalhar com grandes quantidades de dados para evitar as penalidades de desempenho de definir a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>valor para várias células.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [práticas recomendadas para dimensionamento do controle DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the cell has finished validating.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois que a célula de término da validação.

trans-unit.source: Handling this event is useful for post-validation processing of the cell value.
trans-unit.target: O evento é útil para pós-validação de processamento do valor de célula.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell loses input focus, enabling content validation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma célula perde o foco de entrada, habilitar a validação de conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Canceling this event cancels the changes to the current cell.
trans-unit.target: O cancelamento deste evento cancela as alterações para a célula atual.

trans-unit.source: When this event is canceled in data-bound mode, the new value is not pushed to the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Quando esse evento é cancelado no modo de associação de dados, o novo valor não é enviado para a fonte de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: When this event is canceled in virtual mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando esse evento é cancelado no modo virtual, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>evento não será gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated> event to perform post-validation processing.
trans-unit.target: Manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated>evento para executar pós-validação processamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidated>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of a cell changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de uma célula é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The CellValueChanged event occurs when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell.
trans-unit.target: O evento CellValueChanged ocorre quando o valor especificado pelo usuário é confirmado, que normalmente ocorre quando o foco deixa a célula.

trans-unit.source: In the case of check box cells, however, you will typically want to handle the change immediately.
trans-unit.target: No caso de células da caixa de seleção, no entanto, você normalmente deve tratar a alteração imediatamente.

trans-unit.source: To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Para confirmar a alteração, quando a célula é clicada, você deve tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: No manipulador, se a célula atual for uma célula de caixa de seleção, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método e passar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when a cell value is changed.
trans-unit.target: Linhas no controle não são classificadas automaticamente quando um valor de célula é alterado.

trans-unit.source: To sort the control when the user modifies a cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method in a CellValueChanged event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para classificar o controle quando o usuário modifica uma célula, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>método em um manipulador de eventos CellValueChanged.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> requires a value for a cell in order to format and display the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controle é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> requer um valor de uma célula para formatar e exibir a célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: Use this event in virtual mode to populate cells with data from a custom data store without causing rows to become unshared.
trans-unit.target: Use este evento no modo virtual para preencher as células com dados de um repositório de dados personalizados sem causar linhas para se tornar não compartilhado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o compartilhamento de linha, consulte [práticas recomendadas para dimensionamento do controle DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o modo virtual, consulte [modo Virtual no controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To add user-specified values to your custom data store, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar os valores especificados pelo usuário para o repositório de dados personalizados, tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and a cell value has changed and requires storage in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controle é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> e um valor de célula foi alterado e requer armazenamento na fonte de dados subjacente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: Use this event in virtual mode to update a custom data store with user-specified data.
trans-unit.target: Use este evento no modo virtual para atualizar um repositório de dados personalizados com dados de usuário especificado.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event to retrieve values from the data store for display in the control.
trans-unit.target: Manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>evento para recuperar valores de armazenamento de dados para exibição no controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o modo virtual, consulte [modo Virtual no controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Clears the current selection by unselecting all selected cells.
trans-unit.target: Limpa a seleção atual, desmarcando todas as células selecionadas.

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, each column and row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método é chamado, cada coluna e linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>está definida como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>

trans-unit.source: Cancels the selection of all currently selected cells except the one indicated, optionally ensuring that the indicated cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a seleção de todas as células selecionadas no momento, exceto o indicado, opcionalmente, garantindo que a célula especificada está selecionada.

trans-unit.source: A `rowIndexException` value of -1 represents a column header, and a `columnIndexException` value of -1 represents a row header.
trans-unit.target: Um `rowIndexException` valor -1 representa um cabeçalho de coluna e um `columnIndexException` valor -1 representa um cabeçalho de linha.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to clear the current selection without canceling the selection of the cell, row, or column indicated by the exception indexes.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é útil para limpar a seleção atual sem cancelar a seleção da célula, linha ou coluna indicado pelos índices de exceção.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value allows individual cell selection, this method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A> property of each cell to `false`, excluding the cell in the row and column specified.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>o valor da propriedade permite a seleção de células individuais, esse método define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A>propriedade de cada célula para `false`, exceto a célula na linha e coluna especificada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value allows full row or column selection, this method also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property of each row or column to `false`, excluding the row or column containing the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>o valor da propriedade permite a completa linha ou coluna seleção, este método também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>propriedade de cada linha ou coluna para `false`, excluindo a linha ou coluna que contém a célula especificada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The excluded cell, row, or column may or may not be in the selected state when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: A célula excluída, linha ou coluna pode ou não estejam no estado selecionado quando este método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: This method selects it if the `selectExceptionElement` parameter value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método seleciona se o `selectExceptionElement` é o valor do parâmetro `true`.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the selection mode, the entire row or column may also be selected as a result.
trans-unit.target: Dependendo do modo de seleção, a linha ou coluna inteira pode também ser selecionada como resultado.

trans-unit.source: The column index to exclude.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna a ser excluído.

trans-unit.source: The row index to exclude.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha a ser excluído.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select the excluded cell, row, or column; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to retain its original state.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para selecionar a célula excluída, linha ou coluna. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para manter seu estado original.

trans-unit.source: columnIndexException is greater than the highest column index.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexExceptioné maior que o maior índice da coluna.

trans-unit.source: -or- columnIndexException is less than -1 when is ; otherwise, columnIndexException is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - ou - columnIndexException é menor que-1 quando é ; caso contrário, columnIndexException é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndexException is greater than the highest row index.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndexException é maior do que o índice da linha mais alto.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndexException is less than -1 when is ; otherwise, rowIndexException is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndexException é menor que-1 quando é ; caso contrário, rowIndexException é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can copy cell text values to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref> and whether row and column header text is included.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os usuários podem copiar os valores de texto de célula para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref> e se o texto de cabeçalho de linha e coluna é incluído.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control copies the text representation of each selected cell to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle copia a representação de texto de cada célula selecionada para a área de transferência.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This value is the cell value converted to a string or, for image cells, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor é o valor da célula convertido para uma cadeia de caracteres ou, para as células de imagem, o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: Values are copied to the Clipboard in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue> formats.
trans-unit.target: Os valores são copiados para a área de transferência em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue>formatos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text>

trans-unit.source: These formats are useful for pasting content into applications such as Notepad, [!INCLUDE[ofprexcel](~/add/includes/ofprexcel-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/add/includes/ofprword-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Esses formatos são úteis para colar o conteúdo em aplicativos, como o bloco de notas, [!INCLUDE[ofprexcel](~/add/includes/ofprexcel-md.md)], e [!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/add/includes/ofprword-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control copies the cells contained in the smallest rectangle that includes all selected cells.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle copia as células dentro do retângulo menor que inclui todas as células selecionadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Rows and columns that do not contain any selected cells are not represented in the copied data.
trans-unit.target: Linhas e colunas que não contêm todas as células selecionadas não são representadas nos dados copiados.

trans-unit.source: Any unselected cells in the remaining rows and columns are represented by blank placeholders.
trans-unit.target: As células não selecionadas em linhas e colunas restantes são representadas por espaços reservados em branco.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the copy mode and the selection mode, header values for the copied rows and columns may be copied, as well.
trans-unit.target: Dependendo do modo de cópia e o modo de seleção, os valores de cabeçalho para as linhas copiadas e as colunas podem ser copiados, também.

trans-unit.source: When users copy content, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Quando os usuários copiar o conteúdo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle adiciona um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>na área de transferência.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This data object is retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse objeto de dados é recuperado do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call this method when you want to programmatically add the data object to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Você pode chamar esse método quando desejar adicionar programaticamente o objeto de dados para a área de transferência.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>method retrieves values for individual cells by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>método recupera valores de células individuais, chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override either or both of these methods in derived classes to customize the layout of copied cells or to support additional data formats.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir um ou ambos os métodos em classes derivadas para personalizar o layout das células copiadas ou para dar suporte a formatos de dados adicionais.

trans-unit.source: For more information about Clipboard operations and data formats, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a área de transferência e formatos de dados, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando a definição dessa propriedade não é válido <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma coluna é adicionada ao controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de colunas exibidas no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Setting the ColumnCount property to 0 will remove all columns from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Definir a propriedade ColumnCount como 0 removerá todas as colunas de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If ColumnCount is reset to a value less than the current value, columns will be removed from the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se ColumnCount é redefinido para um valor menor que o valor atual, as colunas serão removidas do final do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: If ColumnCount is set to a value greater than the current value, columns will be added to the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se ColumnCount é definido como um valor maior que o valor atual, as colunas serão adicionadas ao final do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A> property to create a simple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> for displaying and editing text.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade pode ser usada com a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>propriedade para criar um simples <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>para exibir e editar texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a column is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property for a column is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando qualquer propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade para uma coluna é definida como um novo valor, ou quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade para uma coluna é definida como um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>pelo menos um valor de propriedade diferente do objeto de estilo de célula anterior.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks a divider between two columns.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário clica duas vezes no divisor entre duas colunas.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a column divider.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse evento para personalizar o comportamento de dimensionamento automático que ocorre quando um usuário clica duas vezes em um divisor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can handle this event to programmatically resize columns based only on the content in the rows that are currently visible, avoiding a performance impact with the default behavior when working with a large number of rows.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode manipular esse evento para programaticamente redimensionar colunas com base apenas no conteúdo de linhas visíveis no momento, evitando um impacto no desempenho com o comportamento padrão ao trabalhar com um grande número de linhas.

trans-unit.source: The column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click.
trans-unit.target: A coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>propriedade não se estende a área na qual um usuário pode clicar duas vezes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the width of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column.
trans-unit.target: Se a largura de uma linha divisória aumentou com o uso dessa propriedade, esse evento ocorre quando o usuário clica duas vezes o limite entre o divisor e a coluna adjacente.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style applied to the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo de borda aplicado aos cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: If the ColumnHeadersBorderStyle property is set to anything other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> property must be a system color.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade ColumnHeadersBorderStyle é definida para algo diferente de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A>propriedade deve ser uma cor do sistema.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GridColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: You cannot set this property to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle> value, which is a read-only value indicating that the border style has been customized through the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você não pode definir essa propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>de valor, que é um valor somente leitura que indica que o estilo de borda foi personalizado com o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If visual styles are enabled for the application through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> property is `true`, the column headers are painted using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se esses estilos estejam habilitados para o aplicativo por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>é de propriedade `true`, os cabeçalhos de coluna são pintados usando o tema atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value of the ColumnHeadersBorderStyle property is ignored for all column headers except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>, to which the theme is not applied.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o valor da propriedade ColumnHeadersBorderStyle é ignorado para todos os cabeçalhos de coluna, exceto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>, aos quais o tema não é aplicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>

trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Highlight%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.HighlightText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Font%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Font%2A> property.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState?displayProperty=fullName>| These values automatically override the values set through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: To force column headers to inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> values, you must set the values in the ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle object to the default values indicated for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: Para forçar os cabeçalhos de coluna para herdar de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>que valores, você deve definir os valores no objeto ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle é para os valores padrão indicado para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre herança de estilo de célula, consulte [estilos de célula no controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A> is set to `true`, all header cells except the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A> are painted using the current theme and the ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle values are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se esses estilos estejam habilitados e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>é definido como `true`, todas as células de cabeçalho, exceto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A>usando o tema atual e o ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle é que os valores são ignorados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.TopLeftHeaderCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the default column header style.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo do cabeçalho de coluna padrão.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando qualquer propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade é definida para um novo valor ou quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>estiver definida como um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>pelo menos um valor de propriedade diferente do objeto de estilo de célula anterior.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, of the column headers row
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura, em pixels, da linha de cabeçalhos de coluna

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the row that contains the column headers.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, da linha que contém os cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default is 23.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 23.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than the minimum height of 4 pixels or is greater than the maximum height of 32768 pixels.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando a definição dessa propriedade é menor do que a altura mínima de 4 pixels ou é maior que a altura máxima de 32768 pixels.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight*> property changes.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height of the column headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a altura dos cabeçalhos de coluna é ajustável e se ele pode ser ajustado pelo usuário ou é automaticamente ajustado para acomodar o conteúdo dos cabeçalhos.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode>, the height of the column headers cannot be adjusted by the user.
trans-unit.target: Quando essa propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode>, a altura dos cabeçalhos de coluna não pode ser ajustada pelo usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode>

trans-unit.source: To adjust the height of the column headers programmatically, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A> method or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para ajustar a altura dos cabeçalhos de coluna programaticamente, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A>método ou conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the sizing mode for the row headers, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o modo de redimensionamento para os cabeçalhos de linha, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.
trans-unit.target: Para o conteúdo da célula encapsular em várias linhas quando os cabeçalhos de coluna são redimensionados, o estilo de célula em vigor para a célula deve ter um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>valor de propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o dimensionamento do cabeçalho, consulte [opções de dimensionamento no controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control does not support double buffering.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>o controle não dá suporte para o buffer duplo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> is set to `true` in a derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>for definido como `true` em um derivado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle, os usuários não receberão comentários visuais ao redimensionar linhas, colunas ou cabeçalhos ou reordenar colunas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode"></xref> value indicating the mode by which the height of the column headers row can be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode"> </xref> valor que indica o modo pelo qual a altura da linha de cabeçalhos de coluna pode ser ajustada.

trans-unit.source: If the ColumnHeadersVisible property is `false`, a column whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> property is set to `true` can still be resized in the user interface (UI) by clicking with the mouse cursor anywhere along the right border of the column to be resized.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade ColumnHeadersVisible `false`, uma coluna cujo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A>está definida como `true` ainda pode ser redimensionada na interface do usuário (IU), clicando com o cursor do mouse em qualquer lugar na borda direita da coluna a ser redimensionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A>

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma coluna estado, por exemplo, recebendo ou perdendo o foco é alterado.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the value of one of the following column properties changes for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> in the control: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Displayed%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado quando o valor de uma das seguintes propriedades de coluna é alterado para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>no controle:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Displayed%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Displayed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>
