trans-unit.source: You can handle this event alone or in combination with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> event to customize the appearance of rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode manipular esse evento sozinhos ou em combinação com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>evento para personalizar a aparência das linhas no controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>

trans-unit.source: You can paint entire rows yourself, or paint specific parts of rows and use the following methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs> class to paint other parts: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A> You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> class to paint standard controls using the current theme.
trans-unit.target: Você pode pintar linhas inteiras por conta própria ou partes específicas de pintura de linhas e use os seguintes métodos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>classe para pintar a outras partes:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A>você também pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>classe para pintar controles padrão usando o tema atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintHeader%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsContent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCellsBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.PaintCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.DrawFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [renderização de controles com estilos visuais](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver usando [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], você também tem acesso a uma biblioteca grande de imagens padrão que você pode usar com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains all the rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção que contém todas as linhas de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Rows collection to manually populate a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control instead of binding it to a data source.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar a coleção de linhas para popular manualmente um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle, em vez de vinculá-la a uma fonte de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how to manually add and insert rows.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como adicionar manualmente e inserir linhas.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have added four <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> instances to the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo supõe que você adicionou quatro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>instâncias para o controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] ``` Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight") Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four") ``` [C#] ``` this.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight");this.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four"); ``` For a detailed example that programmatically populates an unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, see the Example section.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] ``` Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight") Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four") ``` [C#] ``` this.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight");this.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four"); ``` para obter um exemplo detalhado que preenche programaticamente um desassociado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, consulte a seção de exemplo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Rows include style information in addition to cell values.
trans-unit.target: Linhas incluem informações de estilo, além dos valores de célula.

trans-unit.source: For this reason, you might want to add or insert rows based on existing rows that you have already styled.
trans-unit.target: Por esse motivo, você talvez queira adicionar ou inserir linhas com base em linhas existentes que você já tem o estilo.

trans-unit.source: You can do this using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopy%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopies%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopy%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopies%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Você pode fazer isso usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopy%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopies%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopy%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopies%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopies%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertCopy%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopies%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddCopy%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Rows collection to modify the values in the control or to remove rows.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar a coleção de linhas para modificar os valores no controle ou remover linhas.

trans-unit.source: You can modify values or remove rows regardless of whether the control is bound to an external data source.
trans-unit.target: Você pode modificar os valores ou remover linhas, independentemente se o controle está vinculado a uma fonte de dados externa.

trans-unit.source: If there is a data source, the changes are made directly to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Se houver uma fonte de dados, as alterações são feitas diretamente à fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: You may still need to push the data source updates to a remote database, however.
trans-unit.target: Você ainda pode precisar enviar por push as atualizações de fonte de dados para um banco de dados remoto, no entanto.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: associar dados para o controle DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how to modify cell values programmatically.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como modificar valores de célula por meio de programação.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] ``` ' Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. Me.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value" ' The previous line is equivalent to the following line. Me.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value" ``` [C#] ``` // Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. this.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value"; // The previous line is equivalent to the following line. this.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value"; ``` In addition to the standard collection capabilities, you can use the Rows collection to retrieve information about rows.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] ``` ' Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. Me.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value" ' The previous line is equivalent to the following line. Me.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value" ``` [C#] ``` // Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. this.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value"; // The previous line is equivalent to the following line. this.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value"; ``` além dos recursos de coleção padrão, você pode usar a coleção de linhas para recuperar informações sobre linhas.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowState%2A> method to determine the state of a particular row.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowState%2A>método para determinar o estado de uma linha específica.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowsHeight%2A> methods to determine the number of rows or the combined height of rows in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowsHeight%2A>métodos para determinar o número de linhas ou a altura combinada de linhas em um estado específico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowsHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the index of a row with a particular state, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetFirstRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetLastRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetNextRow%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetPreviousRow%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para recuperar o índice de uma linha com um estado específico, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetFirstRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetLastRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetNextRow%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetPreviousRow%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetPreviousRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetNextRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetLastRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.GetFirstRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how to retrieve the index of the first selected row, and then use it to programmatically delete the row.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como recuperar o índice da primeira linha selecionada e, em seguida, usá-lo para excluir programaticamente a linha.

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim rowToDelete As Int32 = Me.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( _ DataGridViewElementStates.Selected) If rowToDelete > -1 Then Me.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete) End If ``` [C#] ``` Int32 rowToDelete = this.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( DataGridViewElementStates.Selected); if (rowToDelete > -1) { this.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete); } ``` To improve performance, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection> returned by the Rows property can include shared and unshared rows.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim rowToDelete As Int32 = Me.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( _ DataGridViewElementStates.Selected) If rowToDelete > -1 Then Me.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete) End If ``` [C#] ``` Int32 rowToDelete = this.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( DataGridViewElementStates.Selected); if (rowToDelete > -1) { this.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete); } ``` para melhorar o desempenho, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>retornado pelas linhas propriedade pode incluir linhas compartilhadas e.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: Shared rows share memory to reduce the cost of a large record set.
trans-unit.target: Linhas compartilhadas compartilham a memória para reduzir o custo de um grande conjunto de registros.

trans-unit.source: If your record set is very large, you should be careful to keep the rows shared as much as possible when accessing the Rows property.
trans-unit.target: Se o conjunto de registros é muito grande, seja cauteloso para manter as linhas compartilhadas tanto quanto possível ao acessar a propriedade de linhas.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [práticas recomendadas para dimensionamento do controle DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"></xref> that contains all the rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection"> </xref> que contém todas as linhas de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a new row is added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois que uma nova linha é adicionada para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.
trans-unit.target: Linhas no controle não são classificadas automaticamente quando novas linhas são adicionadas.

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method in a RowsAdded event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para classificar novas linhas em sua posição correta, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>método em um manipulador de eventos RowsAdded.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the user adds a new row using the row for new records, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value in the handler for this event is equal to the index of the new location of the row for new records, which is one greater than the row just added.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário adiciona uma nova linha usando a linha para novos registros, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor no manipulador para esse evento é igual ao índice do novo local da linha para novos registros, que é maior do que a linha que acabou de adicionar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you add rows programmatically, however, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> value is the index of the first row added.
trans-unit.target: Quando você adicionar linhas programaticamente, no entanto, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>valor é o índice da primeira linha adicionada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowsAddedEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, this event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event and can be used to create new records in your data store that you can then populate in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event handler.
trans-unit.target: No modo virtual, esse evento ocorre antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>eventos e pode ser usado para criar novos registros no seu repositório de dados que podem ser preenchidos no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>manipulador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default style applied to the row cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo padrão aplicado às células de linha do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle exibe suas células usando estilos indicados pela <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>propriedade, que herda estilos de outras propriedades do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> de célula</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For cells in all rows, excluding header cells, the styles specified through the RowsDefaultCellStyle property override the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties, and are overridden by the styles specified through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para células em todas as linhas, exceto as células de cabeçalho, os estilos especificados por meio da propriedade RowsDefaultCellStyle é substituem os estilos especificados por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades e são substituídos por estilos especificados por meio do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [estilos de célula no controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When getting this property, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed.
trans-unit.target: Ao obter essa propriedade, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>padrão valores serão criados se a propriedade já não tiver sido acessada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode causar um impacto no desempenho ao obter esta propriedade de várias linhas.

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, use a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> to set this property for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que possível, use um único <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>para definir essa propriedade para várias linhas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [práticas recomendadas para dimensionamento do controle DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to apply to the row cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> para aplicar a células de linha de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new value or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> property is set to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando uma propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade é definida para um novo valor ou quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A>estiver definida como um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>pelo menos um valor de propriedade diferente do objeto de estilo de célula anterior.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row or rows are deleted from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma ou mais linhas são excluídas do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When rows are deleted from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, the index numbers of subsequent rows are lowered to compensate.
trans-unit.target: Quando as linhas são excluídas de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle, os números de índice das linhas subsequentes são reduzidos para compensar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row changes state, such as losing or gaining input focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma linha muda de estado, por exemplo, perdendo ou ganhando o foco de entrada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the row that represents the template for all the rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a linha que representa o modelo para todas as linhas no controle.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you want greater control over the appearance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> rows than what is provided by the various <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: Às vezes você desejar maior controle sobre a aparência de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>linhas que é fornecido pelas várias <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>Propriedades de estilo de célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The RowTemplate property lets you create and initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> for use as a template by all rows, including the row for new records if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade RowTemplate lhe permite criar e inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>para uso como um modelo por todas as linhas, inclusive a linha para novos registros se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you are setting default values for properties such as row height.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil quando você está definindo valores padrão de propriedades, como a altura da linha.

trans-unit.source: For example, you may want to increase the default row height in order to provide extra room beneath ordinary cell content for displaying content that spans multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você talvez queira aumentar a altura de linha padrão para fornecer espaço extra abaixo do conteúdo da célula comum para exibir o conteúdo que se estende por várias colunas.

trans-unit.source: Setting the row template is necessary when external data is displayed using custom types derived from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: Definir o modelo de linha é necessário quando dados externos são exibidos usando tipos personalizados derivados da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>classe</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> de

trans-unit.source: With unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controls, you can programmatically populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection with instances of your custom row type.
trans-unit.target: Com desassociada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controles, você pode preencher programaticamente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>coleção com instâncias do seu tipo de linha personalizado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When displaying external data, however, the rows are generated automatically, but they are based on the row template, which you can set to an instance of your custom row type.
trans-unit.target: Ao exibir dados externos, no entanto, as linhas são geradas automaticamente, mas eles se baseiam no modelo de linha, que pode ser definida para uma instância do seu tipo de linha personalizado.

trans-unit.source: If this property has not been set the first time you retrieve its value, a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> is created and returned.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade não foi definida na primeira vez que você recuperar seu valor, um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>é criada e retornada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> representing the row template.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> que representa o modelo de linha.

trans-unit.source: The specified row when setting this property has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView*> property set.
trans-unit.target: A linha especificada ao definir essa propriedade tem seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView*>conjunto de propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's state changes from shared to unshared.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o estado de uma linha é alterado de compartilhado para não compartilhado.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event during development and testing to help identify code that causes rows to change from a shared to an unshared state.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse evento durante o desenvolvimento e teste para ajudar a identificar o código que faz com que linhas alterar de compartilhado para um estado não compartilhado.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when scaling the control to display large amounts of data.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil ao dimensionar o controle para exibir grandes quantidades de dados.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a row has finished validating.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois que uma linha de término da validação.

trans-unit.source: This event is analogous to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> event.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é análogo ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>

trans-unit.source: Use this event to perform post-processing on a row of values.
trans-unit.target: Use este evento para executar o pós-processamento em uma linha de valores.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row is validating.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma linha está sendo validada.

trans-unit.source: This event is analogous to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é análogo ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use this event to perform validation on all the values of a row.
trans-unit.target: Use este evento para executar a validação em todos os valores de uma linha.

trans-unit.source: If the row does not pass validation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se a linha não passar na validação, defina o <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Canceling this event prevents the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated?displayProperty=fullName> events from occurring, and also prevents the user from leaving the invalid row and prevents the row from being saved to an external data source in data bound mode.
trans-unit.target: O cancelamento deste evento impede o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated?displayProperty=fullName>eventos ocorra e também impede que o usuário deixar a linha inválida e impede que a linha sejam salvos em uma fonte de dados externa no modo de dados associado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowValidated>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user scrolls through the control contents.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário rola o conteúdo do controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of scroll bars to display for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo das barras de rolagem para exibir para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value of this property, scroll bars are shown only when they are needed.
trans-unit.target: Independentemente do valor dessa propriedade, as barras de rolagem são mostradas apenas quando eles são necessários.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to prevent scroll bars from appearing.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade para impedir que as barras de rolagem apareçam.

trans-unit.source: This is useful, for example, when you want to provide an alternative user interface (UI) for scrolling.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil, por exemplo, quando você deseja fornecer uma interface de usuário alternativa (UI) para rolar.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando a definição dessa propriedade não é válido <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property cannot be set because the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> is unable to scroll due to a cell change that cannot be committed or canceled.
trans-unit.target: O valor dessa propriedade não pode ser definido porque o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> é não é possível rolar devido a uma alteração de célula que não pode ser confirmada ou cancelada.

trans-unit.source: Selects all the cells in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona todas as células de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in column-selection mode and this method is called, each column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `true`, and each row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>está no modo de seleção de coluna e esse método é chamado, cada coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>está definida como `true`e cada linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>está definida como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Conversely, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is in row-selection mode and this method is called, each row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `true`, and each column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>está no modo de seleção de linhas e esse método é chamado, cada linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>está definida como `true`e cada coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A>está definida como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of cells selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de células selecionadas pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedCells property is always populated regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SelectedCells sempre é populada independentemente do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>o valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade contém um instantâneo somente leitura da seleção no momento em que ele é referenciado.

trans-unit.source: If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> state in which the user may have changed the selection.
trans-unit.target: Se você mantém uma cópia dessa coleção, ele pode ser diferente do real, subsequentes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>estado no qual o usuário pode ter sido alterado a seleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should not operate on a copy of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, você não deve operar em uma cópia da coleção.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection"></xref> that represents the cells selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection"> </xref> que representa as células selecionadas pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of columns selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de colunas selecionadas pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> for the SelectedColumns property to be populated with selected columns.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>propriedade deve ser definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>para a propriedade de colunas selecionadas sejam preenchidos com colunas selecionadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade contém um instantâneo somente leitura da seleção no momento em que ele é referenciado.

trans-unit.source: If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> state in which the user may have changed the selection.
trans-unit.target: Se você mantém uma cópia dessa coleção, ele pode ser diferente do real, subsequentes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>estado no qual o usuário pode ter sido alterado a seleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should not operate on a copy of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, você não deve operar em uma cópia da coleção.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection"></xref> that represents the columns selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection"> </xref> que representa as colunas selecionadas pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of rows selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de linhas selecionadas pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> for the SelectedRows property to be populated with selected rows.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>propriedade deve ser definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode>para a propriedade SelectedRows a ser preenchido com as linhas selecionadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade contém um instantâneo somente leitura da seleção no momento em que ele é referenciado.

trans-unit.source: If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> state in which the user may have changed the selection.
trans-unit.target: Se você mantém uma cópia dessa coleção, ele pode ser diferente do real, subsequentes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>estado no qual o usuário pode ter sido alterado a seleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You should therefore not operate on a copy of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, você não deve operar em uma cópia da coleção.

trans-unit.source: To programmatically select a row, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Selected%2A>property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para selecionar programaticamente uma linha, defina seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Selected%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Selected%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection"></xref> that contains the rows selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection"> </xref> que contém as linhas selecionadas pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current selection changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a seleção atual é alterada.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs whenever cells are selected or the selection is canceled, whether programmatically or by user action.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre sempre que as células são selecionadas ou a seleção será cancelada se programaticamente ou por ação do usuário.

trans-unit.source: For example, this event is useful when you want display the sum of the currently selected cells.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, esse evento é útil quando você deseja exibir a soma das células selecionadas no momento.

trans-unit.source: When you change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property, the SelectionChanged event occurs before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você altera o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>propriedade, o evento SelectionChanged ocorre antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any SelectionChanged event handler accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property at this time will get its previous value.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum manipulador de eventos de SelectionChanged acessando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>propriedade no momento terá seu valor anterior.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the cells of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> can be selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica como as células da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> pode ser selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the SelectionMode property clears the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Alterar o valor da propriedade SelectionMode limpa a seleção atual.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando a definição dessa propriedade não é válido <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"></xref> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode*> property of one or more columns is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando a definição dessa propriedade é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode"> </xref> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode*>propriedade de uma ou mais colunas for definida como <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode*>

trans-unit.source: This member overrides <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Este membro substitui <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>valor da propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>valor da propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>valor da propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>valor da propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the width or height values exceeds the maximum value of 8,388,607.
trans-unit.target: Um ou ambos dos valores de largura ou altura excede o valor máximo de 8,388,607.

trans-unit.source: Sets the currently active cell.
trans-unit.target: Define a célula ativa no momento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses this method whenever it changes the current cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle usa esse método sempre que altera a célula atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: This method changes the current cell without changing the selection and optionally without validating the previous cell or changing the selection anchor cell.
trans-unit.target: Esse método altera a célula atual sem alterar a seleção e, opcionalmente, sem validar a célula anterior ou alterando a célula de âncora da seleção.

trans-unit.source: The anchor cell is the first cell of a block of multiple cells that the user can select by holding down the SHIFT key and clicking the last cell of the block.
trans-unit.target: A célula de âncora é a primeira célula de um bloco de várias células que o usuário pode selecionar mantendo pressionada a tecla SHIFT e clicando na última célula do bloco.

trans-unit.source: If `rowIndex` and `columnIndex` are both -1, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se `rowIndex` e `columnIndex` são ambos -1, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>retorna propriedade `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to make the new current cell the anchor cell for a subsequent multicell selection using the SHIFT key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para tornar a nova célula atual na célula de ancoragem de uma seleção multicell subsequente usando a tecla SHIFT; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to validate the value in the old current cell and cancel the change if validation fails; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para validar o valor na célula atual antigo e cancelar a alteração se a validação falhar; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell is being set as a result of a mouse click; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula atual está sendo definida como resultado de um clique do mouse; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell was successfully set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula atual foi definida com êxito; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1, and rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexé menor que 0 ou maior que o número de colunas no controle menos 1, e rowIndex não é -1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1, and columnIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndex é menor que 0 ou maior que o número de linhas no controle menos 1, e columnIndex não é -1.

trans-unit.source: The specified cell has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A célula especificada tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible*>valor da propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: -or- This method was called for a reason other than the underlying data source being reset, and another thread is currently executing this method.
trans-unit.target: - ou - este método foi chamado por um motivo diferente de fonte de dados subjacente que está sendo redefinido e outro thread está em execução atualmente esse método.

trans-unit.source: The new current cell tried to enter edit mode, but its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*> property does not indicate a class that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and implements <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A nova célula atual tentou entrar no modo de edição, mas o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>propriedade não indica uma classe que deriva de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> e implementa <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType*>

trans-unit.source: Changes the selection state of the cell with the specified row and column indexes.
trans-unit.target: Altera o estado de seleção da célula com os índices de linha e coluna especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses this method whenever it changes the selection state of a cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle usa esse método sempre que o estado de seleção de uma célula é alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The selection state changes without regard to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value, and without changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: As alterações de estado de seleção sem considerar atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>valor de propriedade, sem alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>o valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to implement your own selection modes.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil quando você deseja implementar seus próprios modos de seleção.

trans-unit.source: The index of the column containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select the cell; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to cancel the selection of the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para selecionar a célula; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para cancelar a seleção da célula.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexé menor que 0 ou maior que o número de colunas no controle menos 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndex é menor que 0 ou maior que o número de linhas no controle menos 1.

trans-unit.target: As alterações de estado de seleção sem considerar atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>valor de propriedade, sem alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>o valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to implement your own selection modes.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil quando você deseja implementar seus próprios modos de seleção.

trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select the column; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to cancel the selection of the column.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para selecionar a coluna; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para cancelar a seleção da coluna.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexé menor que 0 ou maior que o número de colunas no controle menos 1.

trans-unit.source: Changes the selection state of the row with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Altera o estado de seleção da linha com o índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control uses this method whenever it changes the selection state of a row.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle usa esse método sempre que ele altera o estado de seleção de uma linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The selection state changes without regard to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property value, and without changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: As alterações de estado de seleção sem considerar atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>valor de propriedade, sem alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>o valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to implement your own selection modes.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil quando você deseja implementar seus próprios modos de seleção.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para selecionar a linha. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para cancelar a seleção da linha.
