trans-unit.target: rowIndexé menor que 0 ou maior que o número de linhas no controle menos 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show cell errors.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve mostrar erros de célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a red glyph will appear in a cell that fails validation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se um glifo vermelho será exibido em uma célula que não passam na validação; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not ToolTips will show when the mouse pointer pauses on a cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as ToolTips serão mostradas quando o ponteiro do mouse permanecer sobre uma célula.

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property is `true` and the mouse pointer is over a cell, the cell displays a ToolTip when one of the following conditions is met: - The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is not `null` or the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, and a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor dessa propriedade é `true` e o ponteiro do mouse está sobre uma célula, a célula exibe uma dica de ferramenta quando uma das seguintes condições é atendida:-o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade não é `null` ou o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>é de propriedade `true`e um manipulador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>evento define a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade com um valor diferente de <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property of the cell has a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>propriedade da célula tem um valor diferente de <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property has no effect when there is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event handler because getting the value of the property automatically raises the event and returns the ToolTip text specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: A definição dessa propriedade não tem nenhum efeito quando há um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>manipulador de eventos como obter o valor da propriedade automaticamente gera o evento e retorna o texto de dica de ferramenta especificado no evento manipulador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: - The cell value is truncated in the cell display.
trans-unit.target: -O valor da célula é truncado na exibição de célula.

trans-unit.source: When the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, the full value of the truncated cell value is displayed in the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>é o valor da propriedade <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, o valor total do valor de célula truncada é exibido na dica de ferramenta.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if cell ToolTips are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as dicas de ferramenta da célula estiver habilitada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the editing glyph is visible in the row header of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o glifo de edição ficará visível no cabeçalho da linha da célula que está sendo editado.

trans-unit.source: The row header will display an editing glyph that looks like a pencil when the current cell is in edit mode and the user has made changes to the cell.
trans-unit.target: O cabeçalho da linha exibirá um glifo de edição que se parece com um lápis quando a célula atual está no modo de edição e o usuário fez alterações para a célula.

trans-unit.source: The editing glyph is colored by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A> property of the row header cell.
trans-unit.target: O glifo de edição é colorido por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>propriedade de célula de cabeçalho da linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The glyph is not rendered if there is not enough space to display it completely.
trans-unit.target: O símbolo não é processado se não houver espaço suficiente para exibi-lo completamente.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the row header cell has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property set, the glyph is removed if there is not enough room for both the text and glyph.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a célula de cabeçalho de linha tem seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>conjunto de propriedades, o símbolo é removido se não houver espaço suficiente para o texto e um glifo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The display of the editing glyph is controlled by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentRowDirty%2A> property in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: A exibição de glifo de edição é controlada pelo valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentRowDirty%2A>propriedade no modo virtual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentRowDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is controlled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, ele é controlado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: The standard glyph is not publicly exposed.
trans-unit.target: O glifo padrão não é exposto publicamente.

trans-unit.source: To customize the glyph, you can create a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> class.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar o glifo, você pode criar um personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the editing glyph is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o glifo de edição ficará visível; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row headers will display error glyphs for each row that contains a data entry error.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os cabeçalhos de linha exibirão glifos de erro para cada linha que contém um erro de entrada de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property indicates if there is an error in one of the cells in a row.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>propriedade indica se há um erro em uma das células em uma linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> is set to a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty>, then an error glyph (![ErrorProvider icon](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider icon")) is shown in the row header.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>é definida como um valor diferente de <xref:System.String.Empty>, em seguida, um glifo de erro (![ErrorProvider ícone](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider ícone")) é mostrado no cabeçalho da linha.</xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default width of the row header includes enough room to display the error glyph, whether or not the glyph is displayed.
trans-unit.target: A largura padrão do cabeçalho da linha inclui espaço suficiente para exibir o glifo de erro, se o glifo é exibido ou não.

trans-unit.source: If the row header size is adjusted so that there is not enough space to display the glyph completely, the glyph is not rendered.
trans-unit.target: Se o tamanho do cabeçalho de linha é ajustado para que não há espaço suficiente para exibir o glifo completamente, o glifo não será renderizado.

trans-unit.source: Because row headers can display both text and glyphs, header content is displayed by priority, as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: Como cabeçalhos de linha podem exibir texto e glifos, conteúdo de cabeçalho é exibido por prioridade, da seguinte maneira: 1.

trans-unit.source: Text displayed in the row header cell.
trans-unit.target: Texto exibido na célula de cabeçalho da linha.

trans-unit.source: The editing glyph.
trans-unit.target: O glifo de edição.

trans-unit.source: The error glyph.
trans-unit.target: O símbolo de erro.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the row width is decreased, the error glyph disappears first, then the standard glyph, then text.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a largura de linha é reduzida, o glifo de erro desaparecerá primeiro, em seguida, o glifo padrão e, em seguida, texto.

trans-unit.source: Advanced users can customize the error glyph by developing a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> class.
trans-unit.target: Usuários avançados podem personalizar no glifo de erro ao desenvolver um personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> indicates there is an error; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> indica que há um erro; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control using an implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface.
trans-unit.target: Classifica o conteúdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlar o uso de uma implementação do <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>interface.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: This method allows advanced customization of the sorting feature of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que a personalização avançada do recurso de classificação da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: In order to implement a highly customized sorting operation, you can write an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick> event and call this method with an instance of a class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=fullName> interface as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Para implementar uma operação de classificação altamente personalizada, você pode escrever um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick>evento e chamar este método com uma instância de uma classe que implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=fullName>interface como um parâmetro.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you will typically set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> to disable automatic sorting and to leave room for a sorting glyph.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, você normalmente definirá o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>para desativar a classificação automática e deixe espaço para um glifo de classificação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When sorting by columns set to programmatic sort mode, you must display the sorting glyph yourself by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Ao classificar por colunas definidas como modo de classificação de programação, você deve exibir o glifo de classificação por conta própria, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method works only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Esse método funciona somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade não está definida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to an external data source, you must use the sorting operations provided by that data source.
trans-unit.target: Quando você associa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle a uma fonte de dados externa, você deve usar as operações de classificação fornecidas pela fonte de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When you provide your own data source by implementing virtual mode, you must also handle the sorting operations yourself.
trans-unit.target: Quando você fornece sua própria fonte de dados Implementando o modo virtual, você deve também manipular as operações de classificação por conta própria.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method automatically sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Chamar esse método automaticamente conjuntos de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>propriedade `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: An implementation of <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> that performs the custom sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma implementação de <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>que executa a operação de classificação personalizada.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: comparer is .
trans-unit.target: compareris .

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>. -or- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <>*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>. -or- <>*> is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sorts the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control in ascending or descending order based on the contents of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: Classifica o conteúdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controle em crescente ou decrescente com base no conteúdo da coluna especificada.

trans-unit.source: This method sorts the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> by comparing values in the specified column.
trans-unit.target: Esse método classifica o conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>comparando valores na coluna especificada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: By default, the sort operation will use the <xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A> method to compare pairs of cells in the column using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, a operação de classificação usará o <xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A>método para comparar pares de células na coluna usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A>

trans-unit.source: For columns with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> properties are set automatically and the appropriate sorting glyph is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Para colunas com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A>propriedades são definidas automaticamente e é exibido no glifo de classificação apropriado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For columns with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para colunas com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, deve exibir o glifo de classificação por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can customize the sorting operation used by this method by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event.
trans-unit.target: Você pode personalizar a operação de classificação usada por este método manipulando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade não foi definida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property has been set, this method works for data-bound columns only.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade foi definida, esse método funciona para colunas de associação de dados somente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound columns have had their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property set.
trans-unit.target: Colunas de associação de dados que tiveram seus <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>conjunto de propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para retornar `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control contains both bound and unbound columns, you must implement virtual mode to maintain the values of the unbound columns when the control is sorted by a bound column.
trans-unit.target: Se seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle contém colunas associadas e não, você deve implementar o modo virtual para manter os valores das colunas não associados quando o controle é classificado por uma coluna associada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can do this by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property to `true` and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Você pode fazer isso definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>propriedade para `true` e manipulando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the column is editable, you should also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event.
trans-unit.target: Se a coluna for editável, você também deve tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o modo virtual, consulte [como: implementar o modo Virtual no controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Sorting by unbound columns when the control is data-bound is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para a classificação por colunas desassociadas quando o controle está associado a dados.

trans-unit.source: The column by which to sort the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A coluna pela qual classificar o conteúdo de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The specified column is not part of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A coluna especificada não faz parte deste <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> property has been set and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound*> property of the specified column returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - ou - <> </> *> propriedade foi definida e o <> </> *> retorna a propriedade da coluna especificada <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: dataGridViewColumn is .
trans-unit.target: dataGridViewColumnis .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.IsDataBound*> property of the specified column returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <> </> *> está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> e <> </> *> retorna a propriedade da coluna especificada <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The object specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> property does not implement the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref> interface. -or- The object specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource*> property has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o objeto especificado pelo <> </> *> propriedade não implementar o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"> </xref> interface. - ou - o objeto especificado pelo <> </> *> propriedade tem um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName> valor da propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> compares two cell values to perform a sort operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> compara dois valores de célula para executar uma operação de classificação.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is not set and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade não está definida e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>é o valor da propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event compares pairs of cells in the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento compara os pares de células na coluna que estão sendo classificadas.

trans-unit.source: It occurs only when the user clicks the header of a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, or when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre somente quando o usuário clica o cabeçalho de uma coluna com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>valor da propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, ou quando você chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29>sobrecarregar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this event occurs for a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando esse evento ocorre para uma coluna com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>valor da propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, deve exibir o glifo de classificação por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to sort rows using the cell values in one column or in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse evento para classificar linhas usando os valores de célula em uma coluna ou em várias colunas.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> properties to compare cell values in the column specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>Propriedades para comparar valores de célula na coluna especificada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A> properties to access values in other columns through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A>Propriedades para acessar valores em outras colunas por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control completes a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controle conclui uma operação de classificação.

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is set to `true` and the control is sorted by an unbound column.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>estiver definida como `true` e o controle é classificado por uma coluna desassociada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column by which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> contents are currently sorted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coluna pela qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> conteúdo está classificado no momento.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is not sorted, this property will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>não está classificada, essa propriedade retornará `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When the column indicated by this property has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, it will display a sorting glyph based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando a coluna é indicado por essa propriedade tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>valor da propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, ele exibirá um glifo de classificação com base no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortOrder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the column has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando a coluna tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>valor da propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>, deve exibir o glifo de classificação por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The value of this property is not meaningful when you sort the control using custom sorting.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O valor dessa propriedade não faz sentido quando você classifica o controle usando a classificação personalizada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom sorting, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Collections.IComparer%29> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre classificação personalizada, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Collections.IComparer%29>método e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Collections.IComparer%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> by which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> contents are currently sorted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"> </xref> pelo qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> conteúdo está classificado no momento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control are sorted in ascending or descending order, or are not sorted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se os itens a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controle são classificados em ordem crescente ou decrescente, ou não estão classificados.

trans-unit.source: This property is used to determine which sorting glyph appears when the column specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A> property has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é usada para determinar qual glifo de classificação é exibida quando a coluna especificada, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A>propriedade tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>valor de propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortedColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the column has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, you must display and hide the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando a coluna tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>valor da propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, você deve exibir e ocultar o glifo de classificação por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the column has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, you can display the sorting glyph, but space is not reserved for it if the column is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: Quando a coluna tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>valor da propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, você pode exibir o glifo de classificação, mas não espaço é reservado para que ele se a coluna é automaticamente redimensionada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The value of this property is not meaningful when you sort the control using custom sorting.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O valor dessa propriedade não faz sentido quando você classifica o controle usando a classificação personalizada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom sorting, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre classificação personalizada, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>método e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the TAB key moves the focus to the next control in the tab order rather than moving focus to the next cell in the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a tecla TAB move o foco para o próximo controle na ordem de tabulação em vez de movê-lo para a próxima célula no controle.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `false` allows the TAB key to move the focus through the grid of cells.
trans-unit.target: Definir essa propriedade como `false` permite que a tecla TAB para mover o foco através da grade de células.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how the cell focus changes when the given TAB key combinations are pressed.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir descreve como o foco de célula é alterado quando pressionadas as combinações de teclas guia determinadas.

trans-unit.source: |Key combination|Result| |---------------------|------------| |TAB|If the StandardTab property is `false`, the focus moves to the next cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: | Combinação de teclas | Resultado | |---------------------|------------| | GUIA | Se a propriedade StandardTab `false`, move o foco para a próxima célula na linha.

trans-unit.source: If the focus is in the last cell in the row, the focus moves to the first cell in the next row.
trans-unit.target: Se o foco está na última célula na linha, o foco é movido para a primeira célula na linha seguinte.

trans-unit.source: If the focus is in the last cell in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, the focus moves to the next control in the tab order.| |SHIFT+TAB|If StandardTab is `false`, the focus moves to the previous cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: Se o foco está na última célula a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, o foco é movido para o próximo controle na ordem de tabulação. | | SHIFT + TAB | Se for StandardTab `false`, move o foco para a célula anterior na linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the focus is in the first cell in the row, the focus moves to the last cell in the previous row.
trans-unit.target: Se o foco está na primeira célula na linha, o foco é movido para a última célula na linha anterior.

trans-unit.source: If the focus is in the first cell in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, the focus moves to the previous control in the tab order.| |CTRL+TAB|The focus moves to the next control in the tab order.|
trans-unit.target: Se o foco está na primeira célula a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, o foco é movido para o controle anterior na ordem de tabulação. | | CTRL + TAB | Move o foco para o próximo controle na ordem de tabulação. |</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the TAB key moves the focus to the next control in the tab order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a tecla TAB move o foco para o próximo controle na ordem de tabulação; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the header cell located in the upper left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a célula de cabeçalho localizada no canto superior esquerdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property allows you to set a value for the cell, associate a shortcut menu with it, or perform any other operations you can perform on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>.
trans-unit.target: Definir essa propriedade permite que você defina um valor da célula, associar um menu de atalho com ele, ou executar outras operações que você pode executar em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: In applications designed for use with right-to-left languages, the cell represented by this property is typically in the upper-right corner.
trans-unit.target: Em aplicativos projetados para uso com idiomas da direita para esquerda, a célula representada por esta propriedade é normalmente no canto superior direito.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref> located at the upper left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref> localizado no canto superior esquerdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Forces the cell at the specified location to update its error text.
trans-unit.target: Força a célula no local especificado para atualizar seu texto de erro.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you maintain cell error text yourself by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Use este método quando você manter o texto de erro de célula por conta própria manipulando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you change the stored error text for the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: Chame este método quando você alterar o texto do erro armazenado para a célula especificada.

trans-unit.source: This will invalidate the cell, forcing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to retrieve the updated error text through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Isso invalidará a célula, forçando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle para recuperar o texto de erro atualizado por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>manipulador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Although you can use this method to update errors for header cells, column header cells do not display error glyphs.
trans-unit.target: Embora você possa usar esse método para atualizar erros de células de cabeçalho, células de cabeçalho de coluna não são exibidos os glifos de erro.

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell to update, or -1 to indicate a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna da célula para atualização ou -1 para indicar uma célula de cabeçalho de linha.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell to update, or -1 to indicate a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula para atualização ou -1 para indicar uma célula de cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than -1 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexé menor que -1 ou maior que o número de colunas no controle menos 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than -1 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndex é menor que -1 ou maior que o número de linhas no controle menos 1.

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to update its display of the cell at the specified location based on its new value, applying any automatic sizing modes currently in effect.
trans-unit.target: Força o controle para atualizar sua exibição da célula no local especificado com base em seu novo valor, aplicação de qualquer modos de dimensionamento automático atualmente em vigor.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you maintain cell values in virtual mode and you update a value in your custom data cache outside of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Use este método quando você manter valores de célula no modo virtual e atualizar um valor em cache dados personalizados fora de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>manipulador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed>

trans-unit.source: This method invalidates the cell, forcing the control to retrieve the new value through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event handler and apply any automatic sizing modes that are in effect.
trans-unit.target: Esse método invalida a célula, forçando o controle para recuperar o novo valor por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>manipulador de eventos e aplicar qualquer modos de dimensionamento automático que estão em vigor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column index of the cell with the new value.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna com base em zero da célula com o novo valor.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based row index of the cell with the new value.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha de base zero da célula com o novo valor.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than zero or greater than the number of columns in the control minus one.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexé menor que zero ou maior que o número de colunas no controle menos um.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the control minus one.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndex é menor que zero ou maior que o número de linhas no controle menos um.

trans-unit.source: Forces the row at the given row index to update its error text.
trans-unit.target: Força a linha no índice de linha especificada para atualizar seu texto de erro.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when you maintain row error text yourself by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é útil quando você manter o texto de erro de linha por conta própria manipulando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you change the stored error text for the specified row.
trans-unit.target: Chame este método quando você alterar o texto do erro armazenado para a linha especificada.

trans-unit.source: This will force the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to retrieve the updated text through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Isso forçará o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle para recuperar o texto atualizado por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>manipulador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row to update.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da linha para atualizar.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexnão está no intervalo válido de 0 para o número de linhas no controle menos 1.

trans-unit.source: Forces the rows in the given range to update their error text.
trans-unit.target: Força as linhas em determinado intervalo para atualizar o texto de erro.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when you maintain row error text yourself by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é útil quando você manter o texto de erro de linha por conta própria manipulando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you change the stored error text for the specified rows.
trans-unit.target: Chame este método quando você alterar o texto do erro armazenado para as linhas especificadas.

trans-unit.source: This will force the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to retrieve the updated text through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Isso forçará o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle para recuperar o texto atualizado por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>manipulador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first row in the set of rows to update.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da primeira linha no conjunto de linhas a serem atualizadas.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the last row in the set of rows to update.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da última linha no conjunto de linhas a serem atualizadas.

trans-unit.source: rowIndexStart is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexStartnão está no intervalo válido de 0 para o número de linhas no controle menos 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndexEnd is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndexEnd não está no intervalo válido de 0 para o número de linhas no controle menos 1.

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndexEnd is less than rowIndexStart.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndexEnd é menor que rowIndexStart.

trans-unit.source: Forces the specified row or rows to update their height information.
trans-unit.target: Força a linha ou linhas especificadas para atualizar as informações de altura.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when you maintain row heights yourself using handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed> events.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é útil quando você manter alturas usando manipuladores para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Call this method whenever you change the stored row heights outside of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Chame este método sempre que você alterar a altura de linha armazenados fora de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed>manipulador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoPushed>

trans-unit.source: This will force the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to retrieve the updated height information through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Isso forçará o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle para recuperar as informações atualizadas de altura por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded>manipulador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first row to update.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da primeira linha para atualizar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to update the specified row and all subsequent rows.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para atualizar a linha especificada e todas as linhas subsequentes.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is less than 0 and updateToEnd is .
trans-unit.target: rowIndexé menor que 0 e updateToEnd é .

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is less than -1 and updateToEnd is .
trans-unit.target: -or- rowIndex is less than -1 and updateToEnd is .

trans-unit.source: -or- rowIndex is greater than the highest row index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: - ou - rowIndex é maior que o maior índice de linha no coleção.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default or user-specified value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor padrão ou especificado pelo usuário da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>

trans-unit.source: Although you can set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property, its value can change depending on the location of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: Embora você possa definir o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>propriedade, seu valor pode mudar dependendo do local do ponteiro do mouse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property in its normal state, which is either its default value, or a value specified in code.
trans-unit.target: Use esta propriedade para recuperar o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>propriedade em seu estado normal, que é seu valor padrão ou um valor especificado no código.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref> representing the normal value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"> </xref> que representa o valor normal de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical scroll bar of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a barra de rolagem vertical do controle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"></xref> representing the vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"> </xref> representando a barra de rolagem vertical.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of pixels by which the control is scrolled vertically.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de pixels por que o controle é rolado verticalmente.

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels by which the control is scrolled vertically.
trans-unit.target: O número de pixels por que o controle é rolado verticalmente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether you have provided your own data-management operations for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se você forneceu suas próprias operações de gerenciamento de dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Virtual mode is designed for use with very large stores of data.
trans-unit.target: Modo virtual é projetado para uso com repositórios muito grandes de dados.

trans-unit.source: When the VirtualMode property is `true`, you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with a set number of rows and columns and then handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> event to populate the cells.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade VirtualMode é `true`, você cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>com um número de conjunto de linhas e colunas e, em seguida, identificador de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded>evento para preencher as células.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Virtual mode requires implementation of an underlying data cache to handle the population, editing, and deletion of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> cells based on actions of the user.
trans-unit.target: Modo virtual requer a implementação de um cache de dados subjacente para lidar com a população, edição e exclusão de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>células com base em ações do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about implementing virtual mode, see [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a implementação de modo virtual, consulte [como: implementar o modo Virtual no controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You must use virtual mode to maintain the values of unbound columns when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is in bound mode.
trans-unit.target: Você deve usar o modo virtual para manter os valores das colunas desassociadas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle está no modo associado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Sorting by unbound columns in bound mode is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para a classificação por colunas desassociadas no modo associado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> uses data-management operations that you provide; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> usa operações de gerenciamento de dados que você fornecer; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes window messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa as mensagens de janela.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the base class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método na classe base.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, passada por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.
